title: Wrong veteran emote?
body:
Before the API changes I saw that I had easily over 200 hours in.

The quest still tries to give me the defender of the league emote.

replies.body: I've been playing the game almost non stop since 2012 and I got defender of the league, whats the prerequisites for each of them? also it says I got the icon but it's not showing up in my emote inventory.
Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to double check the total hours played.
After API changes it shows only hours in ranked,like 5months ago I had like 800hours(the last time I could check) now I have 83hours,but still got emote for 1500hours(I think its that one)
